name: Yee-Haw!
description:
Howdy, partner! Welcome to the LowRez West!

Yee-Haw! is an arcade roguelite in homage of old western films. You play a wandering hero (or villain) who always seems to find trouble.

---

CONTROLS

Arrow keys - Navigation
Enter - Selection
Control - Ability Description in battle / Character/Stats Screen otherwise

---

CURRENT FEATURES

  • RPG-esque stats and level-up
  • Equipment progression
  • Turn-based combat
  • Short events outside of combat

---

PLANNED FEATURES

  • Semi-procedural story
  • Generated characters and relationships
  • Additional abilities
  • Additional weapons
  • Class/preset system
  • More backgrounds
  • Music and additional sounds
  • More events

---

KNOWN BUGS

  • Merchants sometimes give you two abilities
  • Merchants sometimes sell you the wrong abilities
  • "Showdown Time" text sometimes doesn't display
  • Debug command "Alt" still in game

---

CREDITS

E. A. - Programming, GUI, Design
S. S. - Design, Art, SFX
